title: Untitled ["May the light of Christmas..."]
marks:
Inscription

ULC, in pencil: [#2]; on back, in p
description: painting on tan matboard; rectangular image of three elves wearing tights, tall pointed caps and pointed shoes--two climbing a small tree and one standing on the snow-covered ground--looking into a window at a burning red candle; holly boughs on border; text at bottom:  \"May the light of Christmas, shine upon your heart.  As Christmas candles shine out on the snow.\"; small sketch of holly bough in pencil on verso
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
